lore: Shortly before Omnia was invaded by Unification forces, King Sigmund managed to develop a wretched spell which he used on the city's water supply.\n\nDespite their appearance and status as undead, Ghouls are incredibly fast. When the Delirious Ghoul stabs his enemies with the tentacles on its shoulder, strange thoughts appear in their heads. Most of them experience doubts and believe that they are about to become one of these creatures.
menagerieDialog: (You can't help but wonder how this creature came to become so damn ugly.)
(It eyes your other creatures hungrily. Better get it a steak before you're left without a team.)
name: Delirious Ghoul
